*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to the public, July 6, 1826. Calling election of delegates to revise judiciary system and to frame tax regulations.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*notice*/p*
*p*The various duties imposed on me as *person_mentioned*Empresario */person_mentioned*and the time which must necessarily be devoted in the Course of the next *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1826">fall*/date_mentioned* and *date_mentioned n="WInter - 1826">winter*/date_mentioned*, to closing the affairs of the *location_mentioned*old Colony */location_mentioned*and commenceing those of the new added to *person_mentioned*Indian */person_mentioned*matters will render it difficult for me to give that attention to those subjects which their importance requires and at the same time attend to the Judicial business of the *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*in detail, for this reason a change is necessary in the organization of the Judicial system of the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*, such a change can be provisionally effected under the general authority vested in me, but I feel an unwillingness to do it without the advice of the *person_mentioned*settlers*/person_mentioned*: I therefore request that the *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*of each *location_mentioned*Alcalde district */location_mentioned*will convene on the *date_mentioned n="08-05-1826">first Saturday of August next*/date_mentioned* at the following places—In the *location_mentioned*district of the Bravo*/location_mentioned* at the *location_mentioned*house of *person_mentioned*William Millican*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned*, in the *location_mentioned*district of Sn felipe*/location_mentioned* at the town of that name, in the *location_mentioned*district of Victoria*/location_mentioned* at *location_mentioned*Bolivar */location_mentioned*in the *location_mentioned*district of Mina*/location_mentioned* at *person_mentioned*Amos Rails*/person_mentioned*, in the *person_mentioned*district of Colorado*/person_mentioned* at *person_mentioned*James Cummins*/person_mentioned* and in the district of *location_mentioned*Sn Jacinto*/location_mentioned* at the*location_mentioned* mouth of Buffalo Bayou*/location_mentioned*; for the purpose of electing two *person_mentioned*representatives */person_mentioned*from each *location_mentioned*district*/location_mentioned*. The said *person_mentioned*representatives*/person_mentioned* thus elected will meet at this place on the *date_mentioned n="08-21-1826">third Monday of August next*/date_mentioned* for the purpose of forming a new provisional Judiciary System for this *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*and to adopt an equitable system of taxation for the support of such new system and to meet the exipences which may arise out of *person_mentioned*Indian */person_mentioned*difficulties.*/p*
*p*The above mentioned *person_mentioned*representatives */person_mentioned*are to be elected with the express understanding by the people that the acts of a majority of them which may be approved of by the *person_mentioned*Empresario */person_mentioned*are to be binding on the whole *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Alcaldes of each district*/person_mentioned* will preside at the said elections and give to the *person_mentioned*persons elected*/person_mentioned* a certificate of their election and a Notice to meet at this place on the *date_mentioned n="08-21-1826">third Monday of August next*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Sn felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="07-06-1826">6 July 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
